version_description:
1. Added fingerprint login (iOS v8.0 and above)
2. Prompt user to place camera closer to router when Wi-Fi signal is weak
3. Mini 360 Plus: improved user interface for pan and tilt control
4. Mini 360 Plus: control pan and tilt when linked alarms are triggered
5. Mini Trooper: low battery and device offline notifications
6. Refresh home screen images when app is opened
7. Introduced 4k streaming capabilities
8. Added compatibility with Home Sense alarm kits
9. Bug fixes
Fix alert message not popup on some iPhone models

6.Support new EZVIZ products

1. Improve Mini Trooper initial setup process and device performance
2. Improve iOS v11 compatibility
3. Support Japanese, Turkish, Farsi, and Arabic
4. Fix other minor bugs and performance issues

6、Supports upcoming EZVIZ devices

bugfix.
bugfix.

EZVIZ always strives to listen to our customers and improve functions based on actual feedback.
In this exciting App update, we have not only fixed minor bugs but we have also added support for upcoming models and other cool features.
We hope you will enjoy these new functions as much as we do and thank you for being part of the EZVIZ Family.
What's New:
1. Added ability to manually adjust the backlighting mode and set custom image styles for C1C Camera Series
2. Added device QSG (Quick Start Guide) in device settings page.
3. Improvements on C3A Battery Camera Series, including optimized network configuration process and optimized detection sensitivity settings (sensitivity setting can now be set during add-device process).
4. Support for upcoming Floodlight Camera Series LC1C.
5. Optimized “Online Help” link inside the App.
6. Optimized push permission pop-up window (for iOS users only)
7. Update multilingual strings.
8. IOS version now integrates with the latest Apple general library.
9. Minor Bugs Fixed.

1.Optimizing user experience of network configuration
2.Upgrading the performance for CloudPlay
3.Bugs fixed
Optimize user experience of network configuration process
bugfix
Correction of missing translation strings for some countries.
bugfix.

1.Support upcoming products
2.Support phone number and email address modification
3.Support permanent account cancellation
4.Optimize several user experience details

1. Added “About” to device Settings to display detailed information of the device.
2. Optimized DP1 and DB1’s sharing permission, so that your sharing partner can answer doorbell calls as well.

1. Now supports our newly-released WLB device.
2. Fixed several bugs and improved performance stability.
bugfix.
bugfix.

1.Support new product A1S
2.Support new product T31
3.Support clearing up alarm message list at one click
4.Support full-day (continuous) recording by SD card
5.Optimize user experience via improving Live View interface
6.Optimize log-in experience via speeding up
7.Optimize the process to initialize SD card
8.Optimize the process to purchase CloudPlay service
9.Add access to LAN Live View without logging in

Fix bugs that few users cannot verify via image verification code.
Fix bugs that few users failed to choose country (region).
Optimize user experience of network configuration process
Correction of missing translation strings for some countries.

Support marking human faces in video or screenshot for certain cameras
Support Questionnaire research in some countries
Optimize the prompt for Siren features

Support new products: C4W, C3W Color Night Vision, C1C Passive Infrared Detection and W3C
Optimizing the configuration process for C3A and W2D
Providing better audio experience when watching Live View

EZVIZ always strives to listen to our customers and improve functions based on actual feedback.
In this exciting App update, we have not only fixed minor bugs but we have also added support for upcoming models and other cool features.
We hope you will enjoy these new functions as much as we do and thank you for being part of the EZVIZ Family.
What's New:
1. Added ability to manually adjust the backlighting mode and set custom image styles for C1C Camera Series
2. Added device QSG (Quick Start Guide) in device settings page.
3. Improvements on C3A Battery Camera Series, including optimized network configuration process and optimized detection sensitivity settings (sensitivity setting can now be set during add-device process).
4. Support for upcoming Floodlight Camera Series LC1C.
5. Optimized “Online Help” link inside the App.
6. Optimized push permission pop-up window (for iOS users only)
7. Update multilingual strings.
8. IOS version now integrates with the latest Apple general library.
9. Minor Bugs Fixed.
bugfix.

EZVIZ always strives to listen to our customers and improve functions based on actual feedback.
In this App update, we have not only fixed minor bugs but we have also added some new features. We also improved the UI in the app, to offer you the best experience.
We hope you will enjoy these new functions as much as we do and thank you for being part of the EZVIZ Family.

What´s New:
We have improved the user interface on several app pages, including the login page and home page.
Included an option for “Offline Help” that works even if the device is offline.
We added a button that allow users to turn on/off the ring tone on DB1 Doorbell.
Now you can check the healthy status of your EZVIZ SD Card on Storage Status page.
Support our new product C3X and Smart Wireless Alarm Panel.
Optimized the registration process for new users.
General performance optimization.

1. Optimized the UI design on home page for Doorbell and Door Viewer.
2. Supported to filter alarm messages by date, device and message type.
3. Now the device firmware could be upgraded automatically if enabled.
4. Support some new features for smart home cameras.

1. Optimized the UI design on home page for Doorbell and Door Viewer.
2. Supported to filter alarm messages by date, device and message type.
3. Now the device firmware could be upgraded automatically if enabled.
4. Support some new features for smart home cameras.
Support our new doorbell and chime.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

What's New:
Support sharing the alarm picture to other Apps
Support sorting device cards of home page
Optimize Playback and support watching playback by fast forward
Support switching At-Home and Home-Away mode quickly
Support saving the device QR code to mobile phone so that you can add device more conveniently
Experiences enhanced

Now we bring out the completely New Update v5.0 of EZVIZ! In this update, we support the followings:
· Set devices under Spaces or change the order of each device as you need! The new-designed device cards on homepage let you control devices so easily and quickly.
· Updated UI for Library, you can filter events in a simpler way!
· Update UI for Shortcuts, Signing in and Creating New Account.
· Choose to enable Email alerts of cameras by going to Menu-General Setting-Email Alerts
· Users can create Geofence now to arm/disarm their cameras.

Now we bring out the completely New Update v5.0 of EZVIZ! In this update, we support the followings:
· Set devices under Spaces or change the order of each device as you need! The new-designed device cards on homepage let you control devices so easily and quickly.
· Updated UI for Library, you can filter events in a simpler way!
· Update UI for Shortcuts, Signing in and Creating New Account.
· Choose to enable Email alerts of cameras by going to Menu-General Setting-Email Alerts
· Users can create Geofence now to arm/disarm their cameras.
· Fix the problem of missing German.

Support Turkish, Romanian, Hebrew, Hungarian.
